articles.description: Trinidadian-born British writer Monique Roffey says she is "pinching herself" over her win.
articles.content:
image captionMonique Roffey's unconventional love story impressed judges
The Mermaid of Black Conch, a dark love story about a fisherman and a mermaid torn from the sea, has won the Costa Book of th… [+3681 chars]

articles.title: The Sun responds to backlash over clumsy take on It's a Sin sex scenes - PinkNews
articles.description: The Sun suffered stinging criticism for a pair of headlines which offered different takes on sex scenes shown in It's A Sin and Bridgerton.
